post.author: port66
post.body: any1 know any fast mirrors.. http://www.iddevnet.com/quake4/ windows download is as slow as dialup

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
zerowing.idsoftware.com has some bittorrents. fileplanet, etc. Do a search for the SDK's filename in yahoo/google. You'll get a TON of results.

Really only ~4/5kbs? That DOES suck!

post.author: port66
post.body: fileshack etc are lame. gamershell keeps dying half way through the dl

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
i've never had issues with fileshack, fileplanet, etc. gamershell I have. Try cnet too.

could be something on your end.

post.author: port66
post.body: probaly. im using 3g broadband. still download at 40-55kbs off good servers

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: where are you physically located? Latency has nothing to do with download speed so it could very well be that there's a server on your ISP that's slowing you down.

post.author: AnthonyJa
post.body:
IIRC he's uk, so I guess this mirror should be nice and fast:

http://ftp.uk.i-scream.org/sites/quakeu ... .2-SDK.exe

Certainly from my UK corporate broadband service I'm getting a nice solid 400k/s from it. BTW, that link is the top link on a google for "uk mirror quake4 sdk"

post.author: port66
post.body:
cheers, its a steady 40kbs

you cant get broadband in briton after you loose your job and dont pay off british telecom. cable is 1/3 of the country
